text: When you put the interest of a kid on money instead of heart then you're destroying the beauty of our lives and our thought process, which should be about how much responsibilities you carry as an athlete and a citizen.
author: Alexis Arguello

text: One of my favorite beauty products is Vincent Longo Water Canvas creamy blush. I have it in every color and I've been using it for 5 years and that's all I put on when I leave the house. It looks so natural I just put a little bit on my cheeks to give them some color.
author: Alessandra Ambrosio

text: Everyday life is like programming, I guess. If you love something you can put beauty into it.
author: Donald Knuth

text: I'm always suspicious of really beautiful women telling us we shouldn't be worried about beauty.
author: Susan Estrich

text: The beauty of a main title is that you establish your main theme and maybe a bit of your secondary theme. You plant the seed that you're going to go water later in the score. And so, having that removed just made it so much more difficult.
author: Danny Elfman
